vsParam:
Wow...!
This is the item [px] made!

Yup, this is the "Puni Ball"!
Isn't it so cute~

Yeah, it feels great too.
Soft and elasticated, perfect for a cushion...

Heads up though, be careful when using this. It's an item
for attack, and it'll hurt yourself in case of misuse.

OK, I got it...
Puni Puni ♪
Hmm, it doesn't seem you've understood that.

Haha!
Nelke is so obsessed with the item made by [px]!

Hehe—— This is how powerful [px] is!
What do you think? Impressive, right~?

Yeah, very impressive! I'd like to ask for
[px]'s help to develop Westbald together!

Let's talk about it later... But [px] is really impressive!
Anyway, [px] is my apprentice!

Huh? When did [px] become your apprentice...
It doesn't make any sense. No one will buy it...

What? Really!?
[px] is your apprentice, Peppermint...

Could it be...
Peppermint is a master alchemist!

Master? I don't know that for sure...
But pretty much the same? After all, it's me.
I see... Peppermint is [px]'s master, an elite alchemist...

I told you before...
Still, I'd like to learn alchemy.

I caused a lot of trouble to people back in Westbald,
which made me really frustrated.

So... Please, "Master" Peppermint!
Could you please teach me alchemy!?

Huh?? "Master" Peppermint?
What do you mean?

(Idiot! It's because you made such a ridiculous lie,
 so Nelke things you're a really great alchemist!)

(Huh huh huh!? No, that's not good!
 I know nothing about alchemy!)

(I know! But it seems she's totally bought your lie...
 Anyway, it's all your fault!)

(Anyway... I'll help you.
 Just play along with me, for Nelke's sake!)

Ah——Ahem, that seems to be my only option!
Let me, Master Alchemist Peppermint, teach you alchemy~!!

Really!?
Thank you so much, Master Peppermint!

How should I put it? You learn alchemy by watching secretly?
So, watching people practice alchemy is the shortcut!

The actual practice process is the same!
Watch how [px] practices alchemy and learn——

Got it, Master!!
"You learn alchemy by watching secretly"... Yeah!

Ah, yeah. So, [px]!
Make several items to show Nelke how alchemy works.

I think I'll have to keep bothering you.
Thank you so much, [px].

Under Master Peppermint's instruction...
I'll try my best too!

Yeah, you look energetic. Nelke, you're one of
those "who fight for their goals bravely!"...

OK, it's supposed to be assistance,
but what the heck is going on... Huh?

Sterky, thanks for helping us gather material.
It's a great help.

I owe little Bell one too!
You also helped me gather a lot!
Wait! I told you not to call me "little Bell" anymore!

Hmm.. She called me "Sterky" too,
which makes me feel... it equals to "you kiddo"...

Um, but... Sterky, you're so much younger
than the one I know...

Yeah, little Bell, you're so much smaller
than the one I know too!

Hey! I'm not a shorty,
what on earth are you talking about?!

Hehe, I found something interesting.
Hey——Guys~ I need you to do me a favor~
